law.catch_line: While an unlimited license is in effect, it authorizes the licensee to provide pilotage for vessels ...

text.section: While an unlimited license is in effect, it authorizes the licensee to provide pilotage for vessels of any draft.

section.section: While a 40-foot-draft limited license is in effect, it authorizes the licensee to provide pilotage for vessels not exceeding 40-foot-draft.
While a 36-foot-draft limited license is in effect, it authorizes the licensee to provide pilotage for vessels not exceeding 36-foot-draft.
While a 32-foot-draft limited license is in effect, it authorizes the licensee to provide pilotage for vessels not exceeding 32-foot-draft.
